system.description: You have trained your memory and are able to use Civil Skills regardless of whether or not you have them memorized, so long as you are not in combat.

Whenever a creature moves outside of your reach, you can make a Strike at it with your equipped melee weapon. Once you take this special action you can't do so again until your next turn.

â˜… Grants @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.sMOJLlVWBNuVXzXt]{Opportunity Attack}
You gain a bonus to your Magic and Physical Armor maximums equal to half your Constitution modifier.

Certain statuses you apply ignore Magic and Physical Armor and have their durations increased by one round.

Affected statuses are @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.f9EgHLBdEVJ70oGg]{Bleeding}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.frCQo2l5BX8ljsNV]{Spiritfire}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.pwMjhiGe1Q35osEy]{Poisoned}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.bW1XPBQBkzJsLeSU]{Acid}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.7wfkn72lnRhuwnk4]{Suffocating}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.gVlbuZ3CMlbP1qRN]{Psychosis}, and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.V9M5OZ1zmCrxnpk8]{Rooted}.
You have trained extensively in combat, you gain +1 to two combat abilities of your choice. You can earn this talent multiple times.
You have gained experience in all manners of life, you gain +1 to all Civil Abilities.
Any healing you receive also restores 25% of that value as Physical and Magic Armor.

While standing on an elemental surface (see table below) the AP cost of your skills that utilize the corresponding school is reduced by one to a minimum of one.

Surface

School

Fire

Flamespeaker

Spiritfire

Flamespeaker

Water

Tidecaller

Ice

Tidecaller

Oil

Duneshaper

Poison

Duneshaper

Blood

Deathbringer

Fog

Stormseeker
You start every round with max AP but your physical armor and magic armor don't protect you from statuses.
The range of your magic skills is increased by 15 feet.
On each of your turn, you can move up to 1 Action Point worth of movement for free.
Whenever you reduce a creature to 0 Health you restore 2 Action Points. This only triggers once per round.
Your movement doesn't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.sMOJLlVWBNuVXzXt]{Opportunity Attack} and your attacks don't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.TTSollRswbZwxvie]{Counterattacks}.

All your magic skills gain a chance to critically strike. This chance is equal to your critical hit chance. When you use a magic skill that deals damage, roll [[/r 1d100]] to determine if it is a critical hit.

You gain +10% Max Health and +5% Evasion.

(Max health calculation is multiplicative)

Whenever a creature hits you with a melee attack, you can Strike back at them with a counter. If they are outside your reach or you are not wielding a melee weapon you cannot make this attack.
